title: It's the Monday after Easter and the crew is back.  Jesus Christ Superstar wins Sunday Night Ratings, Fool #1 pranks a 47 year church usher veteran, Egypt Sherrod stops by and more!
itunes:title: It's the Monday after Easter and the crew is back.  Jesus Christ Superstar wins Sunday Night Ratings, Fool #1 pranks a 47 year church usher veteran, Egypt Sherrod stops by and more!
description:
Its the Monday after Easter and the show is back. Jesus Christ Superstar does very well and the crew talks to Egypt Sherrod and they discuss the premiere of her show. Nephew Tommy does the Closing Remarks for today and more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
